title: Slagel Hall served 2.1 million meals to the US #military last year. #soliders #dininghall

description:
Sponsor Content by Fidelity

Many newcomers to investing want to match their investments to the things they care about – but don’t always know where to start. To create a space for these conversations, Fidelity presents “Bright Ideas,” a new talk show all about illuminating a path to increased confidence with investing. Join host Rod Thill as he kicks off the series with a focus on sustainable investing. Rod welcomes special guests Anna White, a sustainable investing analyst at Fidelity, and ESG consultant Jamie Bechtel, for a fun discussion about what it actually means to invest sustainably and how to make it a social exercise linked to things you already know and care about.

Learn more about getting a start in sustainable investing here: https://www.fidelity.com/sustainable/overview?immid=100726&imm_pid=328989824&imm_aid=a%25eaid!&dfid=&buf=99999999

While environmental, social and corporate governance (ESG) factors are available to incorporate into our inv
title: lluminate Your Investing To Match Your Interest In Sustainability | Bright Ideas
